name: Tracon!2012:SE
description: Tracon!2012:SE is not an arcade game. With a complex command structure, advanced AI and Speech Recognition technology Tracon!2012:SE will allow you to experience of the thrill of being a real air traffic controller working on the approach/departure position.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Pro / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.2 GHz Graphics: 1GB dedicated video card Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows  7 Pro / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Graphics: 2GB dedicated video card Storage: 700 MB available space
